moves.1. e4: I enjoyed this game, not much in the begin but as it progressed, saw an opportunity an it payed off, nice. Even if it's is against a lesser ranked played no disrepect intended to my opponent. A win is a win an it's a great feeling !!
moves.1... e6 2. Nc3 Bb4 3. Qf3 Bxc3 4. Qxc3: Move 4, Took with Queen as i wanted to maintain my pawn formation.
moves.4... Nf6 5. d3 d5 6. e5 Nfd7 7. d4 O-O: Move 7, He's castled i'm thinking my two pawns in the centre are a slighty vunerable to attacks from both flanks possibly.
moves.8. Be3 b6 9. O-O-O Bb7 10. Nf3: Move 10, In three moves i've got pieces around my pawns.
moves.10... Nc6 11. h4 a5 12. a3 a4 13. g4 Na5: Move 18, Kg4, it will soon go on a journey
moves.18... Kg7 19. Bh3 Qe7 20. Rh2 Nb6 21. Nf: Move 31,Bxe6 this is a good move, my bishop will stay here an play a part.
